description: This file defines a data model for a movie script using Pydantic, and sets up an agent to generate such scripts based on a prompt.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script with fields for setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on movie_agent to print the response for a given prompt.
